Song.title: In Christ Alone
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Keith Getty and Stuart Townend ©2001 Kingsway Music Thankyou Music

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [Am7 Em7 D D]
VERSE 1: In [G/D]Christ a[D]lone my [G]hope is [A]found [D/F#]He is my [G]light, [D/F#]my st[Em]rength[A7sus], my s[D]ong This [G/D]Corners[D]tone, this [G]solid [A]ground [D/F#]Firm through the [G]fierc[D/F#]est d[Em]rought[A7sus] and s[D]torm [D]What heights of [G]love, what [D]depths of [A]peace When [D/F#]fears are [G]stilled, when [Bm]strivings [Asus]cease [A ] My [G]Comfort[D]er, my [G]All in [A]All [D/F#]Here in the [G]love [D/F#]of [Em]Chris[A7sus]t I [D]stand [A G]
VERSE 2: [G/D]In Christ a[D]lone who [G]took on [A]flesh [D/F#]Fullness of [G]God [D/F#]in [Em]helpless[A7sus] [D]babe This [G/D]Gift of [D]love and [G]righteous[A]ness [D/F#]Scorned by the [G]ones [D/F#]He [Em]came[A7sus] to sa[D]ve Till [D/F#]on that [G]cross as [D/F#]Jesus [A]died The [D/F#]wrath of [G]God was [Bm]satis[Asus]fied [A] For [G]every [D]sin on [G]Him was [A]laid [D/F#]Here in the [G]death [D/F#]of [Em]Christ[A7sus] I [D]live [A G]
{new_page} VERSE 3: [G/D]There in the [D]ground His [G]body [A]lay [D/F#]Light of the [G]world [D/F#]by [Em]dark - [A7sus]ness [D]slain Then [G/D]bursting [D]forth in [G]glorious [A]Day [D/F#]Up from the [G]grave [D/F#]He r[Em]ose [A7sus] aga[D]in [D/F#]And as He [G]stands in [D/F#]victory [A ] Sin’s [D/F#]curse has [G]lost its [Bm]grip on [Asus]me [A] For [G]I am [D]His and [G]He is [A]mine [D/F#]Bought with the [G]pre[D/F#]cious [Em]blood[A7sus] of [D]Christ [A G]
VERSE 4: [G/D]No guilt in [D]life, no [G]fear in [A]death [D/F#]This is the [G]power [D/F#]of [Em]Chris[A7sus]t in [D]me From [G/D]life’s first [D]cry to [G]final [A]breath [D/F#]Jesus comm[G]ands [D/F#]my [Em]des [A7sus]- tin[D]y No [D/F#]power of [G]hell, no [D/F#]scheme of [A]man Can [D/F#]ever [G]pluck me [Bm]from His [Asus]hand [A] Till [G]He re[D]turns or [G]calls me [A]home [D/F#]Here in the [G]power [D/F#]of [Em]Chris[A7sus]t I’ll [D]stand [A G]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 in christ alone my hope is found he is my light my strength my song this cornerstone this solid ground firm through the fiercest drought and storm what heights of love what depths of peace when fears are stilled when strivings cease my comforter my all in all here in the love of christ i stand verse 2 in christ alone who took on flesh fullness of god in helpless babe this gift of love and righteousness scorned by the ones he came to save till on that cross as jesus died the wrath of god was satisfied for every sin on him was laid here in the death of christ i live verse 3 there in the ground his body lay light of the world by dark ness slain then bursting forth in glorious day up from the grave he rose again and as he stands in victory sins curse has lost its grip on me for i am his and he is mine bought with the precious blood of christ verse 4 no guilt in life no fear in death this is the power of christ in me from lifes first cry to final breath jesus commands my des tiny no power of hell no scheme of man can ever pluck me from his hand till he returns or calls me home here in the power of christ ill stand

Arrangement.description: Key Change to E on Last Verse
Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [Am7 Em7 D D]
VERSE 1: In [G/D]Christ a[D]lone my [G]hope is [A]found [D/F#]He is my [G]light, [D/F#]my st[Em]rength[A7sus], my s[D]ong This [G/D]Corners[D]tone, this [G]solid [A]ground [D/F#]Firm through the [G]fierc[D/F#]est d[Em]rought[A7sus] and s[D]torm [D]What heights of [G]love, what [D]depths of [A]peace When [D/F#]fears are [G]stilled, when [Bm]strivings [Asus]cease [A ] My [G]Comfort[D]er, my [G]All in [A]All [D/F#]Here in the [G]love [D/F#]of [Em]Chris[A7sus]t I [D]stand [Dsus D]
VERSE 2: [G/D]In Christ a[D]lone who [G]took on [A]flesh [D/F#]Fullness of [G]God [D/F#]in [Em]helpless[A7sus] [D]babe This [G/D]Gift of [D]love and [G]righteous[A]ness [D/F#]Scorned by the [G]ones [D/F#]He [Em]came[A7sus] to sa[D]ve Till [D/F#]on that [G]cross as [D/F#]Jesus [A]died The [D/F#]wrath of [G]God was [Bm]satis[Asus]fied [A] For [G]every [D]sin on [G]Him was [A]laid [D/F#]Here in the [G]death [D/F#]of [Em]Christ[A7sus] I [D]live [Dsus D]
{new_page} VERSE 3: [G/D]There in the [D]ground His [G]body [A]lay [D/F#]Light of the [G]world [D/F#]by [Em]dark - [A7sus]ness [D]slain Then [G/D]bursting [D]forth in [G]glorious [A]Day [D/F#]Up from the [G]grave [D/F#]He r[Em]ose [A7sus] aga[D]in [D/F#]And as He [G]stands in [D/F#]victory [A ] Sin’s [D/F#]curse has [G]lost its [Bm]grip on [Asus]me [A] For [G]I am [D]His and [G]He is [A]mine [D/F#]Bought with the [G]pre[D/F#]cious [Em]blood[A7sus] of [D]Christ [Dsus D]
VERSE 4: [A/E]In Christ a[E]lone who [A]took on [B]flesh [E/G#]Fullness of [A]God [E/G#]in [F#m]helpless[B7sus] [E]babe This [A/E]Gift of [E]love and [A]righteous[B]ness [E/G#]Scorned by the [A]ones [E/G#]He [F#m]came[B7sus] to sa[E]ve Till [E/G#]on that [A]cross as [E/G#]Jesus [B]died The [E/G#]wrath of [A]God was [C#m]satis[Bsus]fied [B] For [A]every [E]sin on [A]Him was [B]laid [E/G#]Here in the [A]death [E/G#]of [F#m]Christ[B7sus] I [E]live [Esus E]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 in christ alone my hope is found he is my light my strength my song this cornerstone this solid ground firm through the fiercest drought and storm what heights of love what depths of peace when fears are stilled when strivings cease my comforter my all in all here in the love of christ i stand verse 2 in christ alone who took on flesh fullness of god in helpless babe this gift of love and righteousness scorned by the ones he came to save till on that cross as jesus died the wrath of god was satisfied for every sin on him was laid here in the death of christ i live verse 3 there in the ground his body lay light of the world by dark ness slain then bursting forth in glorious day up from the grave he rose again and as he stands in victory sins curse has lost its grip on me for i am his and he is mine bought with the precious blood of christ verse 4 in christ alone who took on flesh fullness of god in helpless babe this gift of love and righteousness scorned by the ones he came to save till on that cross as jesus died the wrath of god was satisfied for every sin on him was laid here in the death of christ i live

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [|D | A |G A| D]
VERSE 1: In [G]Christ a[D]lone my [G]hope is [A]found [D/F#]He is my [G]light, my st[A]rength, my s[D]ong This [G/D]Corners[D]tone, this [G]solid [A]ground [D/F#]Firm through the [G]fiercest d[A]rought and s[D]torm What heights of [G]love, what [D]depths of [A]peace When [D/F#]fears are [G]stilled, when [D]strivings [Asus]cease [A ] My [G]Comfort[D]er, my [G]All in [A]All [D/F#]Here in the [G]love of [A]Christ I [D]stand [A G D]
VERSE 2: [G/D]In Christ a[D]lone who [G]took on [A]flesh [D/F#]Fullness of [G]God in [A]helpless [D]babe This [G/D]Gift of [D]love and [G]righteous[A]ness [D/F#]Scorned by the [G]ones He [A]came to sa[D]ve Till on that [G]cross as [D/F#]Jesus [A]died The [D/F#]wrath of [G]God was [D]satisfied [A] For [G]every [D]sin on [G]Him was [A]laid [D/F#]Here in the [G]death of [A]Christ[A7sus] I [D]live [A G D]
{new_page} VERSE 3: [G/D]There in the [D]ground His [G]body [A]lay [D/F#]Light of the [G]world by [A]dark - [A7sus]ness [D]slain Then [G/D]bursting [D]forth in [G]glorious [A]Day [D/F#]Up from the [G]grave He r[A]ose [A7sus] aga[D]in [D/F#]And as He [G]stands in [D/F#]victory [A ] Sin’s [D/F#]curse has [G]lost its [D]grip on me [A] For [G]I am [D]His and [G]He is [A]mine [D/F#]Bought with the [G]precious [A]blood[A7sus] of [D]Christ [A G D]
VERSE 4: [G/D]No guilt in [D]life, no [G]fear in [A]death [D/F#]This is the [G]power of [A]Chris[A7sus]t in [D]me From [G/D]life’s first [D]cry to [G]final [A]breath [D/F#]Jesus comm[G]ands my [A]des [A7sus]- tin[D]y No [D/F#]power of [G]hell, no [D/F#]scheme of [A]man Can [D/F#]ever [G]pluck me [D]from His [Asus]hand [A] Till [G]He re[D]turns or [G]calls me [A]home [D/F#]Here in the [G]power of [A]Chris[A7sus]t I’ll [D]stand [A G D]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 in christ alone my hope is found he is my light my strength my song this cornerstone this solid ground firm through the fiercest drought and storm what heights of love what depths of peace when fears are stilled when strivings cease my comforter my all in all here in the love of christ i stand verse 2 in christ alone who took on flesh fullness of god in helpless babe this gift of love and righteousness scorned by the ones he came to save till on that cross as jesus died the wrath of god was satisfied for every sin on him was laid here in the death of christ i live verse 3 there in the ground his body lay light of the world by dark ness slain then bursting forth in glorious day up from the grave he rose again and as he stands in victory sins curse has lost its grip on me for i am his and he is mine bought with the precious blood of christ verse 4 no guilt in life no fear in death this is the power of christ in me from lifes first cry to final breath jesus commands my des tiny no power of hell no scheme of man can ever pluck me from his hand till he returns or calls me home here in the power of christ ill stand
